rev.comment: Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/Bogbogbog|Bogbogbog]] ([[User talk:Bogbogbog|talk]]) to last revision by 86.47.88.193 ([[WP:HG|HG]])
Removed the word 'more' from before 'different' - something is different or it is not.
removing a protection template from a non-protected page ([[User:DumbBOT/Protection|info]])

Protected Ebonics: Persistent [[WP:Vandalism|vandalism]]: a blizzard of IP numbers ([edit=autoconfirmed] (expires 07:26, 3 August 2011 (UTC)) [move=autoconfirmed] (expires 07:26, 3 August 2011 (UTC)))
No, it is not a portmanteau but a blend. And the "phonics" is not that of the "[[phonics]]" article.
partial rv of removal by [[Special:Contributions/SQGibbon|SQGibbon]] ([[User talk:SQGibbon|talk]])
minor cleanup; restoring hypertext (this is appropriate, esp. with jargon)
/* Identity politics */ This seems obvious, if you grow up with a dialect then you'll speak it. Also the "nature vs. nurture" claim is not otherwise part of the article
no ref tags after reflist, or the software freaks
/* Identity Politics */ very slight touch-up. But why is this here rather than in the AAVE article?
changed the wording of one of my previous edits
/* Common usage */ No, nutty though this may seem, a claimed independence from English, and not merely Standard English.
Removing a freshly added wodge of material that might belong in the AAVE article but does not belong in this one.
